__e: The government of today has no right telling us how to live our lives, because the government of 200 years ago already did.
Yes...your father was a good man. I remember one day I'm talking 20 years ago...
You know, if I could take what I know now, put it in the body I had ten years ago, that would be someone I wouldn't want to fight.
